website_summaries.verdict: While the features could be richer and the price is a little stiff, LeakSmart's System provides reliable protection.
pros: The LeakSmart Complete Home Water Protection System is responsive, relatively easy to set up and solidly designed
cons: The hub doesn't add much value, and the app needs work
Most importantly, for the price, the system should include more -- more sensors and more features

customer_reviews.title: No support.  Sensors 2/2 failed.
customer_reviews.text: The hub seems to sync well with Wink hub for now. None of the two sensors I bought work. One just stays constant LED the other syncs but when tested with water beeps but the hub and app do not know. That's fine. Bugs. But the support is awful. Two weeks still haven't heard back from them. Presales questions answered promptly but Leaksmart is either avoiding support because they know of issues or just don't care.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Does not work satisfactory, high price
customer_reviews.text: Needs 3 batteries and they go dead in about 3 month. I have multiple of these and they beep at random for no reason. Also they have to be paired with my hub every time after battery replacement. It will only detect water in one spot under the detector, so a bathroom might need multiple of these but the price is way to high for that.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why options are for "FIT". Bought many ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why options are for "FIT". Bought many of these for my house. found some to work perfectly and others difficult to "Include" on my network. Some refuse to give the proper battery condition to the HUB and others are difficult to "Exclude from the HUB. I'm assuming that these are new but sometimes feel that they are refurbished. I also notice that they do not work with the Vera Plus HUB.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works with Iris as well.
customer_reviews.text: Works with Iris 2nd generation. Tested, pairs and works like a charm! Almost half of Lowes's price! Protection against water damage for under $100! Everybody shoudl have it. Actually you should buy some extra sensors to have one everywhere where water could be present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make the impossible possible.
customer_reviews.text: This product and my wink hub made what seemed impossible possible. I set a trigger for my heat to go on if the temp dropped too low. Then another temp to shut the heat off once the right temperature for my newborns room was reached. Love it because the infants room is traditionally colder and I needed to make sure my baby didn't turn into an icicle
customer_reviews.author: Realtony

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be doing the job.
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to know if it synched to my Wink hub originally, and then when the battery needed to be replaced, synching up again was questionable, but it seems to be working although the on the Wink Sensor page it hasn't updated but when you drill into the Leaksmart itself, it is updating. I should probably call Leaksmart, but just haven't taken the time.
customer_reviews.author: EKZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Also reads temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Paired a few of these with my Wink hub to monitor my water heater and dishwasher. Bonus feature is that they also monitor temperature. I used the one under my water heater to trigger a robot to turn on the exhaust fan in my garage during the summer. Without the exhaust fan pulling all of the hot air out of the garage- the bedroom above the garage stays warmer than the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Chu

customer_reviews.title: Initially mis-paired, but now works right. -- Or, if at first you don't succeed, pair, pair again.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Note that the temperature sensor would not refresh itself when initially paired. Unpaired & started again pairing the sensor unit from scratch, and now it works properly. It seems that zwave needs to be carefully paired, ie: in the 'expected final operating location', for it to reliably work.
customer_reviews.author: hcw3

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my WINK hub
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my WINK hub. Very easy setup. Small and compact - fits almost anywhere. Used these by my water heater, under my kitchen sink, and behind the water line to my refrigerator. All trouble spots in my older home.
customer_reviews.author: A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these in my basement, one in the well room and one in the A/C room where I have a condensate pump to get rid of the condensation. Have them connect to Wink and can check on them with my phone. Great addition to my Wink home and piece of mind. They do work. Was cleaning out the pump and slopped water out the side, immediate alert.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Hammack

customer_reviews.title: but looking good. Most systems that insurances approve are very expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a plumber and still watching and testing, verdict still out, but looking good. Most systems that insurances approve are very expensive and this one is affordable and hoping insurance will approve. Water sensors work great and quick response along with being emailed with water problem. I am still check the wireless connection in large application
customer_reviews.author: David Paulk

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install using threaded push fittings. I used tape and pipe dope around threads and have not had any issues with leaking. The whole install took less than one hour. The valve paired easily with my smartthings hub though I have not been able to pair the leak sensor. I will update the review with more, if I get it to pair. I still give the valve 5 starts as I am not sure it is a problem with the sensor itself that it can't connect to ST.
customer_reviews.author: Bse5798

customer_reviews.title: A smart idea for a smart home
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant idea for those pesky water leaks that can cause so.much damage. I placed this product under my kitchen sink and now plan to add several more for my other sinks and one near the hot water tank. It was easy to setup on the wink app. It not only detects presence of water leaks, it also reads out the ambient temperature. I have wink robots setup to alert me if the area under the sink gets below 32 degrees to prevent freezing of pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Newton

customer_reviews.title: No 1-inch valve available.
customer_reviews.text: They are good but realized (when I prepared the site for installation) that my house has 3/4-inch pipe from the county but the copper pipe from the meter going into the house are 1-inch. The leakSmart valve only come in 3/4 inch valve.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements!
customer_reviews.text: Needs much improvements! Bought two extra sensors, ended up sending one back because it would not program. Needs main a/c power with battery backup like the main unit. Tested several times, only shuts water off via robots with my Wink system. Cannot get these to shut off water directly.
customer_reviews.author: Jbird

customer_reviews.title: Amazing system
customer_reviews.text: This valve is amazing along with the Wink Hub and sensors. I installed everything by myself with no real problems. It's only been in a short time but so far so good. If you have any problems they have a terrific customer service. I highly recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: royboy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install using sharkBite fittings
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install using sharkBite fittings. Make sure you have a electrical plug close to allow direct hook up to power source. Wifi signal works well, my router is 2 floors away from the leaksmart unit and paired easily. Great peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: It's a great device conceptually however it stopped working one week after being installed. I tried a second one and it didn't work at all. Customer support started off helpful then wouldn't respond. Rather disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my project
customer_reviews.text: Used this to automate my shower so I can make my morning routine easier. Just used a couple pipe adapters from hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew D Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Battery life stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Wink. It was easy to pair. However, the battery life stinks. A year later and I have changed the batteries 5 times. It works but I can’t rely on it due to the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: John Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Temperature function doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple months now, and the temperature never updates. Tried reinstalling at the advice of tech support - same problem. Doesn't appear to be ready for prime time, and makes me worry whether the leak detection will work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: batteries run out fast
customer_reviews.text: The sensor was easy to set up and connect to my Wink hub. The problem is the batteries run out extremely quickly, so you are going to end up spending a ton of money on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: not good for a fast leak
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to beep after it is in the water, not good for a fast leak. Also does not beep very loud. You cannot hear it outside of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Zignice

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Gives me peace of mind after a near flood in my house. I use it with Wink. I had no issues connecting it and it worked fine when testing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised with Wink hub. Supervised battery and communication give a piece of mind and make this product truly reliable. After purchasing the first one, I have installed 3 more
customer_reviews.author: Troy A. Blades

customer_reviews.title: Faulty device don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Faulty device don't waste your money . Does not hold battery charge drains new batteries quickly . Cannot find on market anymore anyway .junk
customer_reviews.author: Jumbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Must better than the previous smart water sensor we owned. I like that it also provides temperature as well.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing system
customer_reviews.text: This valve is amazing along with the Wink Hub and sensors. I installed everything by myself with no real problems. It's only been in a short time but so far so good. If you have any problems they have a terrific customer service. I highly recommend these products. Ok, it's been several weeks now and the system works fine but my water pressure has declined greatly due to reducing my 1" line to 3/4 inch. I have removed it and I am now looking for a similar system that has a 1" valve. Update: Homedepot.com has the 1" Leaksmart valve at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: royboy

customer_reviews.title: Probabably the smartest addition to my smart house.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Probabably the smartest addition to my smart house.
customer_reviews.author: JD Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful system! I have 5 sensors. Very easy to set up . . . but only after a call to Customer Service. Manual and video tutorial not accurate. Technician very helpful and got me going. He said manual is being rewritten.
customer_reviews.author: R. Welding

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on for Wink
customer_reviews.text: I just love it... You know, isn't that amazing that a second unclaimed functionality exceeds the main one you got the product for ?! Well, it was the case here. Besides being excellent on detecting water leak and letting you know after (at least) one minute, it monitors the temperature. In the Wink system this allow to trigger the thermostat when needed based on the desired temperature of a room. Battery excellent, 100% after 3 months of usage. SO the dilemma is the purpose of usage: Leak sensor or temperature. No worries. Use as needed, they are not supposed to be installed nin a fixed location. Just purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: HELIO

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have them by every toilet in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa W.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to link this valve and sensor to wink hub
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with wink hub. Very easy to link this valve and sensor to wink hub.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better setup. 2 of my three devices I purhcased ...
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to setup with Wink. Inconsistent when configuring with Wink. Needs a better setup. 2 of my three devices I purhcased actually configured after 15 tries.
customer_reviews.author: David M Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Flawless works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. You will need to plumb it into your existing main water line and can't sweat it directly. I used 1 conventional threaded fitting that I sweat onto the pipe. I was then able to screw the valve onto that, for the other side i used a sharkbite threaded fitting so I didn't need to apply any heat to sweat it on. From a tech angle I used my Wink Hub and it was one of the easiest devices that I have to pair to the system. The hub is on my ground level and the valve is in my basement without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Agro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thread type is unique causing small leak, otherwise it works okay.
customer_reviews.author: WeBeHab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great leak detector , also show temperature - works with wink
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Synced to Wink hub readily but after only a few hours it lost the connection. Reset the connection and after a few hours it lost the connection again. Sensor is only 10 feet from the hub. Not reliable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D Ward

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for 10 days
customer_reviews.text: Pair with Wink. So far so good for 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: so good, system works very well with (no) complaints
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, system works very well with (no) complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: Lamar J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Installed with Probite fittings to illiminate the hastle of sweating the copper fittings. Easily paired it to the sensor and used wink as my gateway. Works beautifully. This is a must for the modern smarthome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Yearwood

product_meta.title: LeakSMART - First Generation Leak Prevention Kit - (1) Shut Off Valve for 3/4" Water main + (1) Sensor
product_meta.description: Style:3/4" Pipe, Valve+SensorProfessional installation recommended. Water damage prevention, by leakSMART, keeps you in constant control of your home's water supply. The system not only detects water leaks throughout your home, but it also shuts off the water and sends you an alert on your smart phone, no matter where you are — all in less than 5 seconds. The leakSMART Home Starter Kit (with Automatic Water Shut Off Valve and Leak Sensor) helps you to stop water damage before it even starts. The Home Starter Kit includes the patented automatic water shut-off valve (in 3/4” size) and one (1) wireless and waterproof sensor. Additional sensors(water alarms) may be purchased separately. Additional valve sizes are also available. leakSMART monitoring app is available for download through the Apple app store on iOS and Google play store for Android. The leakSMART leak detection system is ideal for preventing water damage in your basement and can be used under the sink, around your hot water tank, next to your washer or water line, or any other place where water leaks may occur. Professional installation is recommended. Kit does not come with LeakSmart Smart Home Hub, so must be paired with Wink, IRIS, or Zigbee based system.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: [FIRST GENERATION] (1) leakSMART patented, automatic water shut-off valve (3/4"), (1) leakSMART wireless & waterproof sensor - Professional installation is recommended.;LEAK PROTECTION: The leakSMART FIRST GENERATION Valve is a patented, electronic motorized brass water ball valve that connects directly to your home’s main water supply, always ready to automatically shut off your water in the event of a leak;LEAK DETECTION SENSORS: leakSMART FIRST GENERATION Sensors are wireless and waterproof, so you can easily and continuously monitor moisture and temperature throughout the house. Additional sensors can be purchased separately;COMPATIBILITY: When paired with a Wink, IRIS, or Zigbee based system, each leakSMART sensor is designed to signal your leakSMART Valve to automatically shut off your water the moment a potential leak is detected, and to send you instant notifications - in less than 5 seconds;Connect.
